Text:
Mr. F, I'm starting to think that there is a heart under that gruff facade
;-)
cool i,ve been jaded for 36 years ,, kill or be killed
Frank, thanks for laying it down for us once again.  These dark days have a name, and the initials on the wall are FFF.

Yeah right .. the spoken language is French...not english...
fuck i thought I had a good one too

FFF,. you are my hero! That review was better than the movie itself! Because the only torrent I could find was French language (and the French would flip their wigs over this one) I went ahead and did the right thing and bought the DVD BECAUSE of having downloaded the bittorrent. It's a great DVD from the always great Something Wierd and, really, if you download an outstanding movie from them, buy it and support Mike Vraney. He really deserves it. 

I loved the lab techs, too and their expression "the chemical caponization." When this movie was first released in the 80's, (and I had a VHS copy of it for years) it was described I think in a Fangoria article on Jeff Hogue, as the guy turning into a giant capon(!?) 

Anyway, in my town, (Cola, SC) we have a dedicated Psychotronic film devotee cult who have guerrilla outdoor screenings on a regular basis. Where did you read the Steve Hawkes interview?
You had me at  "Jack Chick tract come to life."!!!
NOTE:   It's been dubbed in French!

it seems we have similiar tastes in movies....i registered with this site just so i could comment this......there is a movie ive been looking for for along time called Martin by romero.....if any has a copy of this it would be you .....if you do please share.....and thanks for all the great downloads
